thread.title: St Paul's unveils new dining space for Christmas
thread.title_full: St Paul's unveils new dining space for Christmas

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: St Paul's unveils new dining space for Christmas
text:
St Paul's unveils new dining space for Christmas St Paul's unveils new dining space for Christmas Details Category: Venues & Events   11:45 Renowned as a venue for prestigious events, St Paul's Cathedral has added yet another jewel to its crown. Designed and built in 1715 by the Cathedral's acclaimed Sir Christopher Wren and his son, Chapter House is a significant landmark in London's portfolio of architectural elegance. This year, following an extensive restoration project, St Paul's Cathedral is proud to open the doors of Chapter House to event bookers for the first time in history. 
With views overlooking the north side of the Cathedral and its iconic dome, the new event venue includes two intimate and ornately decorated rooms, perfect for fine dining (up to 24) and elegant receptions (up to 70). Related articles
